author: dkhaywood
msg: ServicesLoader - adding some Java 5.0 generics and simplifying slightly.

author: dkhaywood
msg: AbstractFixtureBuilder can now optionally take an NakedObjectPersistor in its constructor (for testing)
- but if it doesn't then looks up lazily from the NakedObjectContext singleton as it has always done.

author: dkhaywood
msg: As per conversation with Rob on Friday, have moved the {Hidden/Disable/Validate}Exception stuff
out of the way (into testlib), and deleted all their subclasses.  Have impacted the facets and Consent
subclasses in turn.  Look at the new deprecated constructors in Veto and Allow, which indicate
some DnD viewer functionality that needs to move into Facets.
Also written a CastUtils helper which will help us start to slowly generify the codebase to Java 5.0.

author: dkhaywood
msg: New core-library, currently empty.  Intent is to move some of the non-language specific applib stuff (such as Clock or Fixtures, perhaps?) into here.  For now it is a placeholder, though.

author: dkhaywood
msg: applib: removed org.junit from manifest since now inherited from parent pom.xml
